remarks: The addition operation of a ring is commutative.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringgcl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringgcl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngoa32 $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G C ) = ( ( A G C ) G B ) ) $.
